title: Ideas vs Spirits, Shallowness of the Hero's Journey, Secularization of Quebec PVK Q/A 1-21-22
description:
0:00:45  Intro
0:07:05  Is there no egregore/collective intelligence, but an agent observer that transforms data from 3rd to 1st person?
0:25:20  Is one issue in movie stories their adoption and conformity to structures proposed by Joseph Campbell, etc.?
0:52:50  What’re the benefits of many sects of Christianity?
1:04:35  Has PVK watched the Righteous Gemstones show?
1:06:20  Is an indirect cause of the Quebec break up with the Catholic Church the celibacy of priests?
1:29:55  Were universities set up to symbolize the womb of Jesus?
1:31:45  Did PVK see Mikhaila Peterson talk about a demon?
1:33:30  Can PVK describe Yosemite park?
1:35:25  How does one delineate between different spirits in his thinking?
1:37:05  Should we be obedient to God or submit to God? 
1:37:55  What’re the spiritual effects of marijuana and alcohol use?
1:47:40  What’re PVK past and present thoughts on Ravi Zacharias?
1:53:45  Was Gomer a trophy wife?
1:54:10  What’re the spirits that derail Christians?
2:00:00  Closing remarks / End of transmission

Weekly Q/A on the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server, Fridays at 11am Pacific Time.

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/p7YYh7Kc
